column5: Built in 1916, this is a registered historical house located in the middle of Heights Houston, Texas.   The house is 4,100 square feet with a double wrap around porch on both both levels. Boasting 6 bedrooms and 2 living rooms with a 65 inch TV and surround sound, this house is perfect for hosting large groups of people. This house can fit anywhere from 7-14 people depending on sleeping arrangements. With a dedicated parking lot and gated entry you can ensure room for up to 12 cars.
